select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by
$sortname$ $sortorder$
) RowNo,A.* from ( select T.ID as id ,T.AnalyseGroupID as analyseGroupID ,B.name as analyseGroupName ,T.Name as name ,(case T.IsAlert when '1' then '报警' else '只记录' end) as isAlert ,T.CheckTimeTypeID as checkTimeTypeId ,C.Name as checkTimeTypeName ,T.CheckTimeValue as checkTimeValue ,CONVERT(varchar(10),T.CheckTimeBegin,24) as checkTimeBegin ,CONVERT(varchar(10),T.CheckTimeEnd,24) as checkTimeEnd ,T.minExcursionValue as minExcursionValue ,T.bounceTime as bounceTime FROM dbo.ANA_AnalyserRoadExcursion T left join dbo.ANA_AnalyseGroups B on T.AnalyseGroupID=B.id left join dbo.ANA_BaseCheckTimeTypes C on T.CheckTimeTypeID=C.id LEFT JOIN Ent_AnalyseGroupsIDAddUserID as au on B.id=au.AnalyseGroupsID where 1=1
and T.Name like '%$name$%'
and au.UserID = #userId#
and B.groupid = #workUnitId#
) A ) B where B.RowNo BETWEEN $fromRow$ AND $toRow$

select count(1) from ANA_AnalyserRoadExcursion as T left join dbo.ANA_AnalyseGroups B on T.AnalyseGroupID=B.id left join dbo.ANA_BaseCheckTimeTypes C on T.CheckTimeTypeID=C.id LEFT JOIN Ent_AnalyseGroupsIDAddUserID as au on B.id=au.AnalyseGroupsID where T.Name like '%$name$%'
and au.UserID = #userId#
and B.groupid = #workUnitId#

SELECT [id] ,[analyseGroupID] ,[name] ,ltrim(rtrim(str(isAlert))) [isAlert] ,[checkTimeTypeId] ,[checkTimeValue] ,CONVERT(varchar(10),[checkTimeBegin],24) as [checkTimeBegin] ,CONVERT(varchar(10),[checkTimeEnd],24) as [checkTimeEnd] ,[minExcursionValue] ,[bounceTime] FROM ANA_AnalyserRoadExcursion where id=#id#

select id,Name from ANA_AnalyserRoadExcursion where Name='$name$'
AND id<>'$id$'
